author: Christian Liljeberg

changelog.release_notes:
- Fixes an issue with weather updates using Yahoo and GPS.
- Fixes error when using miles for distance walked.
Bug fixes and minor improvements.

- Added an option disable Health data in the popup window.
- You can now set your own colors for the popup window. The color settings can be found in the weather settings.
- The wind speed unit now defaults to whatever Yahoo or Forecast.io sends. 
- Other minor cosmetic fixes.

- Added popup window with health data and more weather data. Shake your watch twice!
- Support for custom location when using Forecast.io.
- No more woeid's when using Yahoo! Just enter your location in plain text!
- Fixed weather icon sometimes not switching to day version.
- Added Russian and Czech languages.
- Fixed problem with weather not being completely hideable on Round.

+ Adds option to use Forecast.io instead of Yahoo as weather data provider.
+ Rewritten to allow for future feature additions.

Fixes problem with temperature only displaying as Fahrenheit.
Adds Turkish language option.
Improvements and changes to ensure an uninterrupted geolocation service.
Fixes an issue with geolocation which caused the weather updates to fail if using GPS.
+ Workaround to make geolocation work again.
- Fixes a bug that caused custom color weather icons to always be white.
- Workaround to get current forecast data.
+ Adds support for Pebble Time Round!
Should fix a very strange weather display problem for some users. Also, you can now switch between C and F without a long delay.
+ Another weather related fix.
+ Fixes a bug introduced in 2.33 which caused the weather and sometimes the date to disappear in Autobahn layout. Sorry for the trouble.
Quick fix to add weather filtering and caching.
Fixes broken Bluetooth symbol from 2.31 and adds weather debug information to the settings page.
Quick fix to notify the user if the weather data from Yahoo is old. No weather will be displayed if the reported data is more than about 24 hours old.

+ Added quiet time option
+ Various bug fixes (no more double vibrations)
+ Two new languages: Finnish and Portuguese

- New settings page
- Speed improvements
- Estonian translation

description:
Now with Pebble Health! Shake your watch twice to see it!

A clean, glanceable, watchface based on the DIN Engschrift typeface with fully customizable colors. Time is right or left aligned so it is the first you see when you pull up your sleeve. 

Battery status, bluetooth warning, weather, seconds and date can be individually disabled for an extra simplified look.

Features:
- Time in big, easy to read, DIN Engschrift, in full custom colors!
- Layout options for left or right hand use, so you can glance in any way you like!
- Shareable color sets!
- Date and day of week in many languages.
- Weather, provided by Yahoo or Forecast.io, with custom icons and temperature in C or F.
- Battery level.
- Bluetooth disconnect warning (with optional vibration).
- Optional vibration every 60, 30 or 15 minutes.
- Optional seconds!
- Quiet mode (no vibrations) between set hours.
- Now with extra information, shake you watch twice for wind speed, direction, feel like temperature, humidity, barometric pressure, sunrise and sunset. Also Pebble Health: steps, distance, calories burned, active time and sleep time!

Geolocation data © OpenStreetMap contributors, ODbL 1.0. http://www.openstreetmap.org/copyright

- Fixes error when using miles for distance walked.

title: DIN Time
